data.title: Young at Heart (Original photograph from the 1954 film) by Gordon Douglas (director); Lenore J. Coffee, Julius J. Epstein (screenwriters); Doris Day, Frank Sinatra, Gig Young, Ethel Barrymore (starrin
data.meta_description: Warner Brothers, Burbank, CA - 1954 - Vintage reference photograph from the 1954 film, showing actors Frank Sinatra and Cliff Ferre. A nihilistic, self-destructive piano player begins a romance with the chipper youngest daughter of a middle-class family. The first of five film collaborations between Sinatra and director Gordon Douglas, followed by "Robin and the 7 Hoods" (1964), "Tony Rome" (1967), "The Detective" (1968), and "Lady in Cement" (1968). Set in the fictional town of Strafford, Connecticut. 10 x 8 inches. Very Good plus, with a light crease to the bottom left corner. - Young at Heart (Original photograph from the 1954 film)
